body:
## Description

This PR adds a extra script observable hook `process_before_every_sampling`. This hook is originally implemented in [SD Forge](https://github.com/lllyasviel/stable-diffusion-webui-forge) in [this commit](https://github.com/lllyasviel/stable-diffusion-webui-forge/commit/848f28af6e94d632a3ed5ae4c5138b7ba814e1ee).

This is a very useful hook as it makes handle txt2img HR pass a lot easier. Most SD Forge extensions use this hook instead of `process` hook.

## Checklist:

- [x] I have read [contributing wiki page](https://github.com/AUTOMATIC1111/stable-diffusion-webui/wiki/Contributing)
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [x] My code follows the [style guidelines](https://github.com/AUTOMATIC1111/stable-diffusion-webui/wiki/Contributing#code-style)
- [x] My code passes [tests](https://github.com/AUTOMATIC1111/stable-diffusion-webui/wiki/Tests)
